ConfirmRemoval: Are you sure you want to remove the Stickman?
TutorialIntro: Welcome to the Stickman activity. Animate a stick figure by making it spin, dance, or jump. Let your imagination run wild and share your animations with your friends!
NetworkIntro: Connect with other users to share your animation
PlayPauseIntro: Click here to play or pause your animation
SpeedIntro: Click here to adjust the speed of your animation
RemoveIntro: Click here to remove a stickman from your animation
AddStickmanIntro: Click here to add a new stickman to your animation
TemplatesIntro: Click here to add a new stickman using a template
ImportFromJournalIntro: Click here to import saved stickmen from your Journal
ImportIntro: Click here to import a video and convert it to stickman animation using pose detection
ExportIntro: Click here to export your stickman animation as a video to your Journal
TimelineIntro: View and navigate through your animation frames here. Click on any frame to edit it
AddFrameIntro: Click here to add a new frame to your animation sequence
FullScreenIntro: Switch to full screen mode for a better experience
JointColorsIntro: Click on the joints to change the pose: the red joints (head, hands, feet) are freely movable. The orange middle joints (elbows, knees, neck) allow rotation. The green joint moves the entire stickman
AnimationSavedToJournal: Animation has been successfully saved to your Journal!
NotVideoFile: Selected file is not a video
PleaseWait: Please wait while we analyze your video...
